channel.title: Pickpocketing?
channel.description: Alrighty so ive gotten theiving and well i want to add in pickpocketing... does anybody know what i would put for a man and where? if you could help me out with that i can make everyother npc only need a working pickpocketing for a man:D

item.title: Pickpocketing?
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

TYVM! Your a genious thanks

Thanks ill be able to create a public void for theiving

Read full topic

item.title: Pickpocketing?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In your second click npc packet (17), just do something like this;

if (NPCID == 2) { if (actionTimer < 1) { if (misc.random(6) == 1) { sendMessage("You pickpocket the man..."); actionTimer = 6; stillgfx(80, absY, absX); sendMessage("...and the man stuns you!"); } else { sendMessage("You pickpocket the man..."); setAnimation(881); addItem(995, 10); actionTimer = 6; sendMessage("...and you steal some coins."); } } }

Read full topic
